column1: '''''lambe''''' is a noun meaning "tongue" in [[Quenya]].<ref name="Names">{{App
column2: Letters}}, Note, ''The names of the letters''</ref>
left]]''Lambe'' is also the name in Quenya of the twenty-seventh letter of the [[Tengwar]] alphabet. <ref name="Names"/>  In all modes this letter represents '''L'''.<ref>{{App
column3: Letters}}, Note, ''The additional letters''</ref>  The Westron name for this letter is '''''Alo'''''.<ref>See [[Westron Tengwar]]</ref>

column1: <!-- Extra blank line needed to keep Etymology from indenting -->
The word derives from the [[Primitive Quendian]] [[Sundocarme
